net.cloud.server.file.request.handler

Class SaveRequestHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.cloud.server.file.request.handler.SaveRequestHandler

  • public class SaveRequestHandler
extends Object
    A handler class which specifically deals with requests to write to a file. (Subclasses of SaveRequest) It exists as a means to break up what would otherwise be a very large handler class, and should also serve to align with the parallel class hierarchies of this subsystem in general.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SaveRequestHandler()
      Default public constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handleRequest(FileOutputStreamRequest req)
      Attempt to handle a FileOutputStreamRequest.
      That is, it will create a FileOutputStream to the requested file and notify the Request object that it is ready or that an exception occurred.
      void handleRequest(PrintWriterRequest req)
      Attempt to handle a PrintWriterRequest.
      That is, it will create a PrintWriter to the requested file and notify the Request object that it is ready or that an exception occurred.
      void handleRequest(XmlSaveRequest req)
      Attempt to handle a XmlSaveRequest.
      A file stream will be opened for the request, and the object saved in the request will be serialized to an XML file.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • SaveRequestHandler

        public SaveRequestHandler()
        Default public constructor. Creates a new instance for use.

    • Method Detail

      • handleRequest

        public void handleRequest(PrintWriterRequest req)
        Attempt to handle a PrintWriterRequest.
        That is, it will create a PrintWriter to the requested file and notify the Request object that it is ready or that an exception occurred.
        Parameters:
        req - The request to fulfill

      • handleRequest

        public void handleRequest(FileOutputStreamRequest req)
        Attempt to handle a FileOutputStreamRequest.
        That is, it will create a FileOutputStream to the requested file and notify the Request object that it is ready or that an exception occurred.
        Parameters:
        req - The request to fulfill

      • handleRequest

        public void handleRequest(XmlSaveRequest req)
        Attempt to handle a XmlSaveRequest.
        A file stream will be opened for the request, and the object saved in the request will be serialized to an XML file. The stream is then closed. There is no usable file descriptor.
        Parameters:
        req - The request to fulfill
